The Rocket League gym environment.

class rlgym.gym.Gym(match, pipe_id=0, path_to_rl=None, use_injector=False)¶
close()¶

Disconnect communication with the Bakkesmod plugin and close the game. This should only be called if you are finished with your current RLGym environment instance.

reset() → List¶

The environment reset function. When called, this will reset the state of the environment and objects in the game. This should be called once when the environment is initialized, then every time the done flag from the step() function is True.

step(actions: Union[numpy.ndarray, List[numpy.ndarray], List[float]]) → Tuple[List, List, bool, Dict]¶

The step function will send the list of provided actions to the game, then advance the game forward by tick_skip physics ticks using that action. The game is then paused, and the current state is sent back to RLGym. This is decoded into a GameState object, which gets passed to the configuration objects to determine the rewards, next observation, and done signal.

Parameters

actions – A tuple containing N lists of actions, where N is the number of agents interacting with the game.

Returns

A tuple containing (obs, rewards, done, info)
